citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
The attending veterinarian needs to conduct a walk through of the facility as it has been over a year since a
regularly scheduled visit to the premises of the exhibitor has been documented.
Correct by: 02-20-2017.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Owner.
